items.title: awsm.fish Updates on May 02, 2023
items.content_text:
### Community Resources

*   [r/fishshell](https://www.reddit.com/r/fishshell) - The Reddit hangout
*   [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/fish-shell/fish-shell) - Come chat with us!

### Prompts

*   [Tide (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/IlanCosman/tide) - A modern prompt manager for Fish
*   [Hydro (‚≠ê807)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/hydro) - Lag-free prompt with async Git status (ooh la la)

### Plugins

*   [z (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/jethrokuan/z) - Pure-Fish [`rupa/z`](https://github.com/rupa/z)-like directory jumping
*   [fzf (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/PatrickF1/fzf.fish) - Ef-üêü-ient key bindings for [`junegunn/fzf`](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf). ([Alternative (‚≠ê889)](https://github.com/jethrokuan/fzf))
*   [nvm (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/nvm.fish) - Node.js version manager lovingly made for Fish
*   [Done (‚≠ê843)](https://github.com/franciscolourenco/done) - Automatically receive notifications after a long process finishes
*   [Spark (‚≠ê357)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/spark.fish) - Sparklines for Fish
*   [Fisher (‚≠ê8.5k)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/fisher) - Manage functions, completions, bindings, and snippets from the CLI
*   [Fundle (‚≠ê384)](https://github.com/danhper/fundle) - `config.fish`-based plugin manager
*   [GitNow (‚≠ê429)](https://github.com/joseluisq/gitnow) - A collection of utility functions to speed up your git workflow
*   [Sponge (‚≠ê340)](https://github.com/meaningful-ooo/sponge) - Clean command history from typos automatically
*   [Autopair (‚≠ê456)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/autopair.fish) - Auto-complete matching pairs in the Fish command-line. ([Alternative (‚≠ê283)](https://github.com/laughedelic/pisces))
*   [Getopts (‚≠ê227)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/getopts.fish) - CLI options parser (alternative to the [`argparse`](https://fishshell.com/docs/current/cmds/argparse.html) builtin)
*   [Fishtape (‚≠ê355)](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/fishtape) - TAP-based test runner for Fish
*   [Pufferfish (‚≠ê339)](https://github.com/nickeb96/puffer-fish) - Text Expansions for Fish
*   [Virtualfish (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/adambrenecki/virtualfish) - Virtualenv wrapper
*   [Async Prompt (‚≠ê459)](https://github.com/acomagu/fish-async-prompt) - Make your prompt asynchronous
*   [Apple Touchbar (‚≠ê93)](https://github.com/rodrigobdz/fish-apple-touchbar) - Customize your [Touch Bar](https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/macos/touch-bar/touch-bar-overview) in iTerm2
*   [Abbreviation Tips (‚≠ê323)](https://github.com/Gazorby/fish-abbreviation-tips) - Remembering abbreviations by displaying tips when you can use them
*   [Base16 Fish (‚≠ê33)](https://github.com/FabioAntunes/base16-fish-shell) - A pure Fish solution to change your shell's default ANSI colors
items.content_html:
Community Resources

  • r/fishshell - The Reddit hangout
  • Gitter Channel - Come chat with us!

Prompts

  • Tide (‚≠ê3.5k) - A modern prompt manager for Fish
  • Hydro (‚≠ê807) - Lag-free prompt with async Git status (ooh la la)

Plugins

  • z (‚≠ê1.4k) - Pure-Fish rupa/z-like directory jumping
  • fzf (‚≠ê2.3k) - Ef-üêü-ient key bindings for junegunn/fzf. (Alternative (‚≠ê889))
  • nvm (‚≠ê2.4k) - Node.js version manager lovingly made for Fish
  • Done (‚≠ê843) - Automatically receive notifications after a long process finishes
  • Spark (‚≠ê357) - Sparklines for Fish
  • Fisher (‚≠ê8.5k) - Manage functions, completions, bindings, and snippets from the CLI
  • Fundle (‚≠ê384) - config.fish-based plugin manager
  • GitNow (‚≠ê429) - A collection of utility functions to speed up your git workflow
  • Sponge (‚≠ê340) - Clean command history from typos automatically
  • Autopair (‚≠ê456) - Auto-complete matching pairs in the Fish command-line. (Alternative (‚≠ê283))
  • Getopts (‚≠ê227) - CLI options parser (alternative to the argparse builtin)
  • Fishtape (‚≠ê355) - TAP-based test runner for Fish
  • Pufferfish (‚≠ê339) - Text Expansions for Fish
  • Virtualfish (‚≠ê1.1k) - Virtualenv wrapper
  • Async Prompt (‚≠ê459) - Make your prompt asynchronous
  • Apple Touchbar (‚≠ê93) - Customize your Touch Bar in iTerm2
  • Abbreviation Tips (‚≠ê323) - Remembering abbreviations by displaying tips when you can use them
  • Base16 Fish (‚≠ê33) - A pure Fish solution to change your shell's default ANSI colors
